      • setParent

        public void setParent(Entity parent)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Updates the parent of this entity.
        This method makes sure that the old and the new parent keep their entities list updated, by automatically calling Entity.addEntity(Entity) and Entity.removeEntity(Entity).

        A CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_PARENT_CHANGED notification is thrown.
        Additionally, each descendant of this entity (ie: entities who have this entity as their direct or not direct parent) are notified using CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_ANCESTOR_CHANGED.

        Specified by:
        setParent in interface Entity
        Specified by:
        setParent in interface VirtualMachine
        Overrides:
        setParent in class VirtualMachineDefault
        See Also:
        VirtualMachine.unplace()

      • setUsableProcessingUnits

        public void setUsableProcessingUnits(List<ProcessingUnit> processingUnits,
                            boolean allocatePu)
        Description copied from interface: VirtualMachine
        Updates the processing units that this VM can use.

        If allocatePu parameter is true, then this method will also update the allocated flag for each of the processing units in the given list. And, if one of the given processing units is already allocated then an exception is thrown.

        If null is given then this VM is allowed to use any processing unit in the parent host, even if it is allocated for another VM and independently from the allocatePu parameter.

        Specified by:
        setUsableProcessingUnits in interface VirtualMachine
        Overrides:
        setUsableProcessingUnits in class VirtualMachineDefault
        Parameters:
        processingUnits - usable processing units, or to null to let this vm use any processing unit on the parent host

      • setUsableNetworkInterfaces

        public void setUsableNetworkInterfaces(List<NetworkInterface> networkInterfaces)
        Description copied from interface: VirtualMachine
        Updates the network interfaces that this virtual machine is allowed to use.

        If null is given then this VM is allowed to use any network interface in the parent host.

        Specified by:
        setUsableNetworkInterfaces in interface VirtualMachine
        Overrides:
        setUsableNetworkInterfaces in class VirtualMachineDefault
        Parameters:
        networkInterfaces - usable network interfaces, set to null to let this vm use any network interface on the parent host.
